mapper.select: select distinct m.*, ur.user_id userId from sys_config_menu m join ref_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.id and rm.deleted = 0 join ref_user_role ur on ur.role_id = rm.role_id and ur.deleted = 0 where m.deleted = 0 and m.parent_id = '' and ur.user_id = #{userId}

select m.*, if(rm.id is null, false, true) checked from sys_config_menu m left join ref_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.id and rm.deleted = 0 and rm.role_id = #{roleId} where m.deleted = 0 order by m.sort_order asc

select * from sys_config_menu where deleted = 0
and type = #{query.type} and route = ''
order by sort_order asc, create_time desc
